SEARCH
Package pl.put.poznan.sorting_madness.logic.json_algorithms

Class JsonHeapSort

java.lang.Object
pl.put.poznan.sorting_madness.logic.json_algorithms.JsonHeapSort
All Implemented Interfaces:
JsonSortable
public class JsonHeapSort extends Object implements JsonSortable
A class that implements the JsonSortable interface and provides heap sort algorithm. The heap sort algorithm creates a binary heap from the given list of elements, and then removes the largest element from the heap and places it at the end of the list until the list is sorted.

  • Method Details

    • heapSort

      public com.google.gson.JsonArray heapSort(com.google.gson.JsonArray array, String attr, SortingOrder order)
      Sorts the given list of elements in ascending or descending order, using the heap sort algorithm.
      Parameters:
      array - the list of elements to be sorted
      order - the desired order for the sorted list (ascending or descending)
      Returns:
      a SortedJsonDataResponse object containing the sorted list of elements and the execution time of the algorithm

    • limitedHeapSort

      public com.google.gson.JsonArray limitedHeapSort(com.google.gson.JsonArray array, String attr, SortingOrder order, int maxIterations)
      Sorts the given list of elements in ascending or descending order, using the heap sort algorithm. The algorithm will only iterate through the list a maximum number of times, as specified by the `maxIterations` parameter.
      Parameters:
      array - the list of elements to be sorted
      order - the desired order for the sorted list (ascending or descending)
      maxIterations - the maximum number of iterations the algorithm should perform
      Returns:
      a SortedJsonDataResponse object containing the sorted list of elements and the execution time of the algorithm

    • heapify

      public void heapify(com.google.gson.JsonArray array, String attr, int size, int i)
      Helper method for the heap sort algorithm. Rebuilds the binary heap with the given root node.
      Parameters:
      array - the list of elements being sorted
      size - the size of the heap
      i - the index of the root node

    • run

      public SortedJsonDataResponse run(com.google.gson.JsonArray array, String attr, SortingOrder order)
      Sorts the given JSON array using the specified attribute and order.
      Specified by:
      run in interface JsonSortable
      Parameters:
      array - the JSON array to be sorted
      attr - the attribute to be used for sorting
      order - the desired order of the sorted array (ascending or descending)
      Returns:
      a SortedJsonDataResponse object containing the sorted array and the execution time (in nanoseconds)

    • run

      public SortedJsonDataResponse run(com.google.gson.JsonArray array, String attr, int maxIterations, SortingOrder order)
      Performs a limited sort on the given JSON array using the specified attribute and order. Only the first maxIterations elements of the array are sorted.
      Specified by:
      run in interface JsonSortable
      Parameters:
      array - the JSON array to be sorted
      attr - the attribute to be used for sorting
      maxIterations - the maximum number of iterations to perform during the sort
      order - the desired order of the sorted array (ascending or descending)
      Returns:
      a SortedJsonDataResponse object containing the sorted array and the execution time (in nanoseconds)
